Class AtomixCopycatClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.util.AtomixCopycatClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class AtomixCopycatClient
extends Object
implements CopycatClient
    A simple CopycatClient wrapper that exposes a custom Transport.
